attributes.action: Ask our MPs to not take Great Britain out of the European Union.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage and Ian Duncan-Smith both have said £350 million a week will not go to NHS, contrary to their referendum leaflet and bus. Daniel Hannan says they cannot guarantee an end to free movement even though this was a Leave campaign promise. A poll by Survation says over 1,000,000 people now wish to change their Leave vote to a Remain vote.
attributes.background: The Leave campaign leaders have misled voters with their campaign on issues such as giving £350 million a week to the NHS and stopping free movement. Over 1,000,000  now regret having voted Leave. Surely this should mean that MP's debate the result but should not act on it.
